tool_description: Creates formatted purchase orders with all required details including supplier information, quantities, pricing, delivery terms, and approval workflows.

supplier_id.description: Supplier identifier for the purchase order

product_ids.description: Products to include in purchase order

requested_delivery_date.description: Requested delivery date for the order

payment_terms.description: Payment terms for the purchase order

priority_level.description: Order priority: Low, Normal, High, Urgent

budget_code.description: Budget or cost center code for accounting

requester_id.description: ID of person requesting the purchase order

approval_required.description: Whether order requires approval before sending

error_messages: Array length mismatch: product_ids, quantities, and unit_prices must have the same length.
Invalid supplier: supplier_id not found in approved supplier list.
Invalid delivery date: requested_delivery_date must be in the future.
Invalid priority level: priority_level must be one of [Low, Normal, High, Urgent].
Invalid quantities: All quantities must be greater than 0.
Invalid prices: All unit_prices must be greater than 0.
usage: Provide supplier, products, quantities, and prices to generate a purchase order. Include delivery requirements and approval settings. Arrays for products, quantities, and prices must have matching lengths.

total_amount.description: Total monetary value of the purchase order

order_status.description: Current status of the purchase order

approval_status.description: Approval status if approval is required

estimated_delivery_date.description: Estimated delivery date based on supplier lead time
